channel.title: Blogs on California Delta Fish Salvage
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on California Delta Fish Salvage

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: This page is intended to give you a feeling of what a blog post looks like. Crab supports both fixed (static) pages as well as blog posts. In order to make blog pages work correctly, you need proper permalinks settings in your site’s config.toml. Hugo will then treat all files in the blog directory (for example) like blog posts. Have a look at the config.toml provided with this example site, as well as the page about Permalinks from the Hugo docs.

item.title: More blogging
item.description: This is yet another blog post to demonstrate the blog feature. It’s from a different month than other posts, to show you how the archive feature works.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
